CustomField.formula: IF(CONTAINS(Region_Comercial_Copia__c,"REGION"), IF(BRMX_Desconto_Obj_Gen_Dem__c >= 12.49, IF(BR_Total_de_pontos__c > 23 , 19.23, IF(BR_Total_de_pontos__c >= 21, 15.38, IF(BR_Total_de_pontos__c >= 16, 7.69, 0))), 0), IF(BRMX_Desconto_Obj_Gen_Dem__c >= 11.76, IF(BR_Total_de_pontos__c > 23, 14.28, IF(BR_Total_de_pontos__c >= 21, 7.14, IF(BR_Total_de_pontos__c >= 16, 3.57, 0))), 0))
CustomField.label: BRMX Desconto Classe 2
